title: Data Science
text: I think being a data scientist is about 2 main things, firstly being able to understand modeling techniques and data analysis in order to analyze a dataset in order to understand it fully. Secondly, I believe it is about communication and the ability to make complex data easy to understand for others.

title: Data Science
text:
R code
We are looking at analyzing the “iris” dataset from r,
firstly we will be looking at the density of the “Sepal.Length” variable from the “iris” dataset.

y = density(iris$Sepal.Length)

Next, we will be looking at the class, type, and structure of this variable y we created.

class(y)

[1] "density"

typeof(y)

[1] "list"

str(y)

List of 7
 $ x        : num [1:512] 3.48 3.49 3.5 3.51 3.52 ...
 $ y        : num [1:512] 0.000232 0.000262 0.000296 0.000333 0.000373 ...
 $ bw       : num 0.274
 $ n        : int 150
 $ call     : language density.default(x = iris$Sepal.Length)
 $ data.name: chr "iris$Sepal.Length"
 $ has.na   : logi FALSE
 - attr(*, "class")= chr "density"
